summary: The focus is on strategic alignment geared towards growth and planning. Emphasizes personal development by recognizing strengths and weaknesses. Strategic tools like SWOT analysis are used to position startups effectively. Networking and resource acquisition are pivotal components.
excerpt: Aligning the Misaligned involves a journey of growth and planning. Personal strengths build confidence and direction, weaknesses foster resilience. Conducting a SWOT analysis clarifies startup positions.
